CustomField.formula: CASE(flair__Type__c, 'DAILY', flair__End_Date__c - flair__Start_Date__c - IF(flair__Start_Date_Half_Day__c, 0.5, 0) - IF(flair__End_Date_Half_Day__c, 0.5, 0) + 1, 'HOURLY', (DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(flair__End_Date__c) & " " & LEFT(TEXT(flair__End_Time__c), FIND(".", TEXT(flair__End_Time__c)) - 1)) - DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(flair__Start_Date__c) & " " & LEFT(TEXT(flair__Start_Time__c), FIND(".", TEXT(flair__Start_Time__c)) - 1))) * 24, 3)
CustomField.label: Amount
